Usage

To use the library in another project, download the latest release of the library from the idai-components releases page or using bower run: 

bower install codarchlab/idai-components

Link the sources from your project's index.html. 

<link rel="stylesheet" href="dist/css/idai-components.min.css">
<script src="dist/idai-components(.min).js"></script>

Make sure you link the stylesheet from the head section and link the javascript between the angular link and your application scripts, which use the library.

Include these dependencies from within your main module: 

angular.module('sampleApp',[
	'idai.components',
	'idai.templates'
]);

See the pages linked in the top menu for detailed documentation of the different components.
